subsection_analysis.refined_text: Enhanced productivity: Work across multiple PDFs and documents in various formats, including Teams and Zoom meeting transcripts, streamlining your workflow and saving time for higher-priority tasks. The generative AI features in Acrobat and Acrobat Reader significantly improve comprehension, help you get insights, and produce high-quality content quickly. Impactful content: You can use the content suggestions that the features generate for impactful emails, presentations, meeting notes, and more.

The capabilities improve comprehension and save time across various document types. Use the generative AI features in Acrobat and Acrobat Reader to quickly scan through lengthy, complex PDF content and get answers or generate a summary. With AI Assistant, you can make targeted requests, such as highlighting the differences between PDF contracts.

Parallel processing: While you engage with the summarized sections, the feature extracts headings, and generates summaries for the subsequent sections. You can access the generative AI features from Acrobat Reader, Acrobat desktop and online, and Acrobat for Microsoft Teams. Segmented display: When you start generating the summary for your content, you'll immediately see summarized content for the sections that the Generative summary feature finished processing.

Many business transactions, including financial, legal, and other regulated transactions, require high assurance when signing documents. Many businesses and governments have chosen to set up a certificate-based digital signature infrastructure within their organization. When documents are distributed electronically, it's important that recipients can: • Verify document authenticity—confirming the identity of each person who signed the document • Verify document integrity—confirming that the document has not been altered in transit Certificate-based signatures provide both of these security services.

Both authors and signers should configure their application environment. You can expedite the signing process and optimize your results by making the following preparations in advance. For details on the full range of configuration options in enterprise settings, see the Digital Signatures Guide.
Add Clients and Stakeholders • Did you enter the email addresses of clients, agents, and other

They also include link recognition so that hyperlinks, internal document links, and tables of contents are created as live links. The created PDFs are high-quality and provide exceptional visual fidelity. They are well-tagged for better accessibility.

Also, refer to the basic configuration settings. Acrobat desktop and mobile: To use AI Assistant for Acrobat, you need not turn on PDF services in the Admin Console. For details, see how to enable the new experience.

Whether you're a researcher, business analyst, or student, the generative AI features help you scan your PDF documents and quickly extract the essence, key points, and insights. Selecting a summary takes you directly to the corresponding section in the document for more detailed information. The Generative summary feature summarizes the document's organization and content.

It improves productivity and efficiency, transforming your interaction with documents anytime, anywhere. While the AI Assistant generates the response, you can select Stop to pause the processing. You can also select from the suggested questions based on the content of your PDF file.
